alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 2:32PM CST until December 15 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Nance County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 245 PM CST. * At 232 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Hordville, or 18 miles northwest of York, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Silver Creek around 245 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
